name: Last Heros Sniper Zombie
description:
Last Heros Sniper Zombie is a simple and addicting zombie shooting game with HQ graphics.

Feel like a real sniper! A zombie group has occupied city. Attack the zombies to save the civilians!
• Enhanced graphics.
• Easy controls with camera view in last hope version.
• Accurate 3D sniper riffle.
• Unlimited bullets to kill zombies.
• Be the headshot to kill the zombies with one bullet in zombie sniper.
